errors.error_description: Incorrect import syntax in the code example - missing proper module path for NeptuneLogger
Missing critical explanation about API key setup and project configuration for new users
correction_candidates: Replace ANONYMOUS_API_TOKEN with your actual Neptune API key from your account settings
Set up your Neptune credentials using environment variables or config file
Configure your project name and API key in the Neptune dashboard first
Create a Neptune project and obtain your API key before running this code
errors.golden_answer: Replace ANONYMOUS_API_TOKEN with your actual Neptune API key from your account settings
